content.html:
When I add the ignition msgs header, I get a new error:

no matching function for call to ‘Set(ignition::msgs::Pose*, gazebo::math::Pose)’ ignition::msgs::Set(visualMsg->mutable_pose(), visual->GetPose());

This seems pretty close.

/usr/include/ignition/msgs0/ignition/msgs/Utility.hh:112:10: note: void ignition::msgs::Set(ignition::msgs::Pose, const Pose3d&) void Set(msgs::Pose _p, const ignition::math::Pose3d &_v);
